thread.title: Excellent service
thread.title_full: Excellent service - Review of Wyndham Garden Long Island City Manhattan View, Long Island City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: raomi3
title: Excellent service
text: I just want to recognize the service that Delilah, Maria, Adrianis and JoAnn gave us during our stay in the Hotel. They treated us with respect, always willing to help in any issued that we had, example how to get to our destiny, change of rooms, etc Overall EXCELLENT service. I want to give them an Standing Ovation for their service, Definitely, I will stay in this Hotel whenever I go back to New York and hope these girls will be there. Last but not least, the drivers of the Shutlle bus, were excellent too.
